long_description: Why buy a headlamp and a lantern when you could get one gadget that does it all? The Snow Peak SnowMiner Headlamp/Lantern switches easily from a bright headlamp to a lantern with soft, diffused light. Simply pop the front silicone piece in or out to switch between headlamp and lantern modes-it only takes a second to do. Single LED operates on high, low, variable and strobe; hold down the power button to engage the variable dim mode to set the brightness at whatever level you want. LED outputs 80 lumens on high and 8 lumens on low; throws light up to 40m on high and 7m on low. 3 AAA batteries (included) provide up to 140 hrs. of use on low, 55 hrs. on high and 250 hrs. on strobe. Built-in hook lets you hang the Snow Peak SnowMiner Headlamp/Lantern inside your tent. Buttons and straps are designed to be functional even while you're wearing gloves. Small red light warns you when your battery power is getting low. IPX4 water resistance protects against sprayed water. Closeout.
short_description: Why buy a headlamp and a lantern when you could get one gadget that does it all? The Snow Peak SnowMiner Headlamp/Lantern switches easily from a bright headlamp to a lantern with soft, diffused light.
